description: Alcalá Real Estate exclusively markets and puts at your disposal this wonderful semi-detached house in one of the most exclusive urbanizations in the entire Henares corridor.With five bedrooms and three full bathrooms, this 331-meter built house offers ample space for your family.In addition to a fabulous garden on a plot of 557 square meters.  It is distributed over three floors: completely open basement with windows and natural light of about 118 square meters according to cadastre, plus ground floor and first floor.On the ground floor we find a very large independent kitchen of about 18 useful square meters that can be converted into an American kitchen attached to the living room and with direct access to the previous patio.Living room with fully functional fireplace of about 30 useful square meters.Large hallway, a full bathroom and two similar rooms of about 11 square meters.On the first floor, the house has another bathroom and three bedrooms, one of them measuring 19 square meters that functions as the main one with a dressing area, with the third bathroom incorporated into a suite that is totally exterior and has a window.Other features to highlight: double aluminum windows with double glazed glass, closed fireplace with cassette in the living room, marble on the ground floor and herringbone oak parquet on the first floor.Diesel boiler with built-in storage tank and independent water heater in one of the bathrooms.Built-in wardrobes in the bedrooms and the hallway, air conditioning in all rooms. Live in a super residential and modern urbanization with all the services within it within walking distance: schools, parks, shopping centers, restaurants, post office, cultural center and delegate office of the Villalbilla town hall.In terms of security, this urbanization also has access control on both doors 24 hours a day, every day of the year.Don't miss this unique opportunity to make this house your home.  Contact us today to schedule a no-obligation visit and discover in situ everything this property has to offer for your family.We do not charge commission to the buyer.Visiting this property is an excellent opportunity to appreciate first-hand all the amenities and features that make this place a unique choice.Don't hesitate to contact us to request more information and schedule a visit as soon as possible! As a real estate agency we offer you financing at no cost, contact us without obligation. The meters of the home are contrasted according to cadastre/registry.This announcement is not binding and may contain errors.It is shown for informational purposes and is not contractual.The sales prices do not include legal taxes or deed expenses.

Do you want peace of mind? DON'T miss this great opportunity just a few kilometers from Madrid! Magnificent independent villa of 900m² in the ZULEMA URBANIZATION, located on a large garden plot of 2,000m², with a heated indoor pool and tennis court. It has four independent apartments, with a living room, bedroom and private bathroom. It is distributed in three heights as follows: Low level: * Entrance hall. * Large living room - dining room of 40m², with granite fireplace, marble floors, large windows and unobstructed views of the garden and pool. * Large independent kitchen with office area, fully furnished with high and low furniture with large storage capacity. It has independent access to the outside of the house. * Bedroom and office with large windows and clear views. * Full bathroom with bathtub. First floor: * Three independent apartments, each of them has a large living room, bedroom, bathroom with bathtub and access to a separate attic. * Fourth apartment with a large living room, two separate bedrooms, a full bathroom with a bathtub and access to a separate attic. Basement: Large 300m² garage, with capacity for 6 cars. As for its qualities, it has individual oil heating, marble and parquet floors, double glazed tilt-and-turn windows and built-in wardrobes. LARGE PLOT OF 2,000M². It has a closed heated pool, tennis court, automatic irrigation tank, 24-hour security and night access control. Very quiet residential area, 25km from Madrid, with all services around, schools, health centers, supermarkets, sports centers, bus stops (231, 232), and with easy access to the M300 highway. Call us without obligation. Reference: VT2449i.

Discover the perfect harmony between modern elegance and natural serenity in this impressive home located in the prestigious El Robledal urbanization, in Villalbilla.  With 314 m2 of construction on a generous 1011 m2 plot, this residence redefines the concept of home. Upon entering, a generous porch invites you to explore a dreamlike living room, enhanced by the warm light of a spectacular fireplace with cassette (LaKunza brand).The open-plan kitchen, with a central island, is illuminated by natural light filtered by two large Velux on the ceiling, creating an open and lively living space.High ceilings and double glazed windows with double thermal bridge add a touch of modernity and energy efficiency. In the kitchen area we have another exit to the plot at the back. A short flight of stairs leads to three bedrooms and a meticulously designed bathroom with a shower, in addition to the master suite, this is more than a bedroom, it is a complete sanctuary with its own bathroom with a shower, and a luxurious dressing room and a living room. additional with a bathtub strategically placed to enjoy views of the oak forest.A fireplace in the room completes this unique experience. On the ground floor, a self-contained apartment with kitchen and bathroom offers flexibility and privacy, ideal for guests or as a creative space.The fireplace adds a cozy touch to this freestanding nook. A detached garage on the plot, currently used as a storage room, provides additional storage. Bask in the sun at the strategically south-facing pool, surrounded by exquisite landscaping.  The secure perimeter of the property is marked by a stone wall and fence, providing privacy and harmonious connection with the surrounding area. Committed to respecting the environment, the property has a pellet boiler (Domusa bioenergi class brand) for heating and hot water using an electric water heater and solar panels, guaranteeing a minimal ecological footprint.In addition, these are prepared for expansion and installation for use with batteries. The parquet and porcelain floors in bathrooms reflect the meticulous attention to detail, creating a luxurious atmosphere in every corner of the residence. Discover the lifestyle you always dreamed of in this exclusive property in El Robledal.Schedule your visit now and immerse yourself in the experience of elegant and sustainable living! Meters of the home verified with cadastre/registry. This announcement is not binding and may contain errors.It is presented for informational purposes and is not contractual in nature. suggestedTexts: {'title': 'Terraced house in Calle Hoces de Riaza, 23'}
description: "Charming semi-detached house in a growth area in the Mirador de Villalbilla Urbanization. With an area of 189 square meters and a plot of 150 meters, this home built in 2007 offers you all the space you need for your family. Distributed over three floors, in the basement you will find a garage for two large cars. On the main floor, a large kitchen equipped with high and low furniture, basic appliances. In addition, on this floor you will also find a toilet and a bright living-dining room with air conditioning and heat pump and access to a cozy rear garden. On the second floor, two double bedrooms with air conditioning and heat pump, a full bathroom with a bathtub and the master bedroom suite with its own full bathroom, bathtub and private terrace. In addition, the property has all the comforts you need in your daily life, such as built-in wardrobes, mosquito nets, heating by hot/cold pump and natural gas, garage space and an ideal orientation towards the south and east. Located in a quiet area, next to the biosphere park, just 5 minutes walk from the Educrea educational center and close to sports courts, playgrounds and bus stops. Don't miss the opportunity to live in the charming town of Villalbilla, with all the necessary services such as a pharmacy, clinic, schools, daycare and supermarket. Come visit this wonderful townhouse and make it your home" Municipality located in the Alcarria de Alcalá region, bordered to the north by Alcalá de Henares and Anchuelo and to the south by Corpa, Valverde de Alcalá and Torres de la Alameda. The territory is dominated by the Cerro del Viso, the Alto de la Muela and the Dehesa de los Hueros (Place names according to the Army Geographic Service). The municipality consists of several population centers: the towns of Villalbilla and Los Hueros (the latter incorporated into Villalbilla in the 19th century due to its small population), and five urbanizations: two next to Villalbilla (El Robledal and Valdeláguila) and four next to Los Hueros (El Viso, El Gurugú, Peñas Albas and Zulema). The historic center of the town is located 42 km from Madrid. This announcement is not binding and may contain errors. It is shown for informational purposes and is not contractual. *Fees included in the price *Expenses and taxes not included. Tax of asset transactions and documented legal acts: In the Community of Madrid 6% on a general basis *.

kwUnix offers a wonderful house for sale located in the center of the town of Villalbilla, this house is ready to move into. With a surface area of 131 meters built. Distributed over two floors and a garage, on the first floor we find a large garage, capacity for a large car and motorcycle, with a motorized door, direct access to the house, ground floor, hall, living room, kitchen with upper and lower furniture, large storage capacity, basic appliances, oven, ceramic hob, and extractor hood, and a small toilet. Stairs with a wooden railing that gives access to the second floor, it has a complete bathroom with a shower, a spacious, bright master bedroom and a large built-in wardrobe, a second bedroom with a built-in wardrobe, and a third bedroom or living room with access to a fantastic terrace. This home has all aluminum windows with thermal break, mosquito nets, parquet floors. It is located on one of the main streets of Villalbilla town, close to supermarkets, pharmacies, health center, bus stop, town hall, daycare centers and school. Municipality located in the Alcarria de Alcalá region, bordered to the north by Alcalá de Henares and Anchuelo and to the south by Corpa, Valverde de Alcalá and Torres de la Alameda. The territory is dominated by the Cerro del Viso, the Alto de la Muela and the Dehesa de los Hueros (Place names according to the Army Geographic Service). The municipality consists of several population centers: the towns of Villalbilla and Los Hueros (the latter incorporated into Villalbilla in the 19th century due to its small population), and five urbanizations: two next to Villalbilla (El Robledal and Valdeláguila) and four next to Los Hueros (El Viso, El Gurugú, Peñas Albas and Zulema). The historic center of the town is located 42 km from Madrid. In the north of the municipality the Anchuelo stream runs, the northern limit of the terrain breaks abruptly, on a steep slope belonging to Alcalá towards the Henares River, this is what is known as El Gurugú. *This announcement is not binding and may contain errors. description: Are you looking for a home where you can disconnect and be with your family while having all the services within reach? How would you like to be able to go to the supermarket, schools, health centers, sports centers or simply go to eat at a restaurant without having to take the car? Our development is located in a privileged area, but without forgetting the convenience of being able to walk anywhere. El Mirador de Villalbilla is the first new construction development that we have just 5 minutes walk from the old town of Villalbilla (Madrid) and 10 minutes by car from Alcalá de Henares (Madrid). An urbanization of 20 semi-detached houses with 3 and 4 bedrooms, 2 of them semi-detached, with enough space for the whole family and gardens of up to 322m2. With refreshing underfloor heating throughout the home, without forgetting that all our homes also have the benefit of aerothermal energy and a type A energy rating. You can choose a kitchen integrated into the spacious living room or make it independent, depending on your lifestyle. Each chalet has its own individual garden, to enjoy with family and friends. In addition, it has common areas, a garden and a community pool to cool off on summer days, and of course you don't have to waste time looking for where to park, because each home has space for 2 vehicles with installation of a power outlet for an electric station. What do you see living there? Don't hesitate and come visit us at our sales office located at C/ Arribes de Duero corner C/ Hayedo de Montejo, in Villalbilla.
address: Calle Valle de Iruelas no number

description: Corner townhouse - El Mirador de Villalbilla Engel & Völkers presents this corner townhouse, with an exceptional location and in very good condition. The house has a constructed area of 219m2 on a plot of 260m2. It has a comfortable distribution, structured on four floors. It has alarm system, underfloor heating system and ACS managed by natural gas condensation boiler installed in 2022 and solar panel system installed in 2023 for better energy efficiency. First floor: We access the house by a small glazed porch with a small hallway which introduces us to the hall that gives way to the social area very well distributed where we find a cozy and bright living room with air conditioning, and with exit to a wide garden of corner recently reformed with orientation southwest. A modern and functional kitchen of good size with lots of light, fully equipped, very careful and with office area facing north. And a courtesy toilet with built-in extractor. Flooring throughout the floor, except in the toilet that is gres. Thermal insulation with double window throughout the plant. The staircase of the house is polished granite, with railings designed in iron and with windows to the side garden. Second floor: Private area where we find three bedrooms. The master bedroom en suite with ceiling fan, with two large fitted wardrobes, north facing terrace and renovated bathroom with shower and window to the outside. Two bedrooms of equal dimensions facing south, fitted wardrobes, ceiling fans and double windows. A complete bathroom with shower and extractor incorporated to share for both rooms. Flooring throughout the floor, except in the shared bathroom that is stoneware. Attic: Of approximately 28m2 offers many possibilities, gym area, work, study, leisure... with two windows in ceiling, well insulated, with possibility to make toilet since it has installation for it and flooring. Garage: With a total useful area of 55m2 and access from the first floor, it has automated doors, the interior with built-in thermal insulation, space for two medium-sized vehicles and with the possibility of incorporating charging system for electric car. It has a storage area and pantry. Garden: Spacious and renovated. A studied design allows to combine an orchard area with fruit trees with a charming "chill out" space to enjoy social meetings. Being a corner, and the strategic location of the house, gives you greater privacy and offers great opportunities.  Do not hesitate to contact us to know this wonderful house. Located in the urbanization El Mirador de Villalbilla, it offers a great opportunity to live in a peaceful environment, very familiar and surrounded by nature.  Very close to schools (kindergarten, primary, secondary and high school), playgrounds, sports and social areas and with the upcoming construction of a shopping center. Just 800 meters from the center of Villalbilla, it has easy access to the village, either walking or by car. In the same municipality there are supermarkets, restaurants, hairdressers, veterinarians, several health centers, pharmacies, church, local police and Civil Guard. Villalbilla offers a wide range of sports: golf course, sports centers, municipal centers with many activities (music school, theater, dance, etc.), tennis, soccer, basketball, paddle tennis and baseball field. From the urbanization itself there is access to several hiking trails. Well connected by several bus lines to Alcalá de Henares, other areas of Villalbilla or neighboring towns. It is 10 km from Alcalá de Henares, 42 km from Madrid and 40 km from Guadalajara.

description: Magnificent semi-detached house in Villabilla Engel & Völkers presents a fantastic semi-detached house in one of the most exclusive urbanizations of the Corredor del Henares. Its distribution is as follows: First floor: The house is accessed from a large porch that allows us to enter a comfortable hall that has a magnificent distribution in two distinct areas. The social area, with a large living room with beautiful marble fireplace and a bow window overlooking the main porch and dining room with direct access to the kitchen. The kitchen consists of approx. 20m2 with access to the outdoor patio. Attached to it there is a room that can fulfill the functions of both service room, as a large pantry and even office. The private area has 1 bedroom en suite, 2 bedrooms and a bathroom with shower. Marble floors in the living-dining room and hallway, ceramic tiled kitchen and parquet in the bedrooms. From this floor there is access to both the upper floor of bedrooms and the basement. Second floor: We access a spacious hall with slightly attic ceiling and lined in wood with parquet flooring, which makes it more cozy. We find on both sides two spacious bedrooms of 25m2 each, very bright, with fitted closets and direct access to a balcony overlooking the Cerro del Viso and west facing. Full bathroom, with bathtub. Basement: Approximately 157m2, it is totally diaphanous, whose advantage is that it allows zoning the space at the whim of the future owners. It also has a fireplace. Without humidity and in very good condition. Garden: Large outdoor area, fully paved. With direct access from the main entrance or from the kitchen. Individual exterior garage, for one car. Although the plot is so large that would allow the parking of two vehicles. It also has a beautiful and spacious backyard designed to enjoy sunny and quiet mornings. The front part is very spacious where there is a small pool, not of work.  If you are interested in visiting the property please contact us, your future home is waiting for you. Magnificent semi-detached house in the exclusive Peñas Albas Urbanization in Villalbilla, Madrid. 5 km from Alcalá de Henares and 37 km from Madrid. In a quiet environment surrounded by nature. Elegant style, this magnificent house very bright and in very good condition, is perfect to disconnect from the city. With one of the best locations within the urbanization as it is a very quiet street, the back adjoins a landscaped common area without buildings, and from the top floor you can see the Cerro del Viso. The urbanization has 24 hour security service, library, sports areas with swimming pool, tennis courts, paddle tennis, playgrounds, town hall office, post office, nursing home, small shopping center, public school and kindergartens, both public and private, has a health center just ten minutes walk and church. In addition to several school routes. In the same area, supermarkets such as Mercadona, Ahorra Más, restaurants, hairdressers, veterinarians, pharmacies, local police and Guardia Civil. The municipality of Villalbilla is one of the few in the area with a wide range of sports, with golf course, sports centers and municipal centers with plenty of activities and baseball field. Communicated by several bus lines to Alcalá de Henares, Villalbilla or neighboring towns.

With an exceptional location and perfect state of conservation. The house has an area of 158m2 built on a 150m2 plot. It has a comfortable layout, structured over three floors. suggestedTexts: {'title': 'Semi-detached house in Avenida de los Antiguos Baños de la Isabela no number'}
description: FOR SALE THE 3RD AND FINAL PHASE. Spacious sustainable designer villas, with large interior and exterior spaces in the fashionable area of Alcalá Urbanización. PREMIUM SUSTAINABILITY: Homes with the highest energy efficiency rating that can be granted to a home: ENERGY RATING A. The El Viso Premium chalets have excellent qualities such as underfloor heating cooling through aerothermal energy, photovoltaic solar panels, double flow ventilation system with heat recovery, electric car charger, exterior carpentry with thermal break, thermostatic taps, etc. The construction systems and materials used have allowed you to live in a totally efficient home with almost zero energy consumption. We want to go one step further and reinforce our environmental commitment and make it your best investment for the future: Do you know BREEAM? BREEAM is the most technically advanced method of evaluation and certification of sustainability in buildings, promoting more sustainable construction that has economic, environmental and social benefits for all people linked to the life of the building. The El Viso Premium promotion is in the certification phase. hi! Real Estate is committed to obtaining the prestigious BREEAM certificate, for which it has initiated the procedures to comply with all the requirements from the first moment. hi! PREMIUM CONNECTED AND SECURE: In El Viso Premium you will have spaces with everything you need for a quick future connection that allows you to remotely act and monitor the elements of your home that you prefer. description: Semi-detached house with 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, with a constructed area of 184 m² distributed over 2 floors plus attic built in 2023. Plot of 264 m² with a free area of 194 m² of which 114 m² is a garden. Ground floor consisting of living room with open kitchen and direct access to the garden, bedroom and toilet. The kitchen is furnished with appliances. First floor with 3 bedrooms, one of them en suite, and 2 bathrooms. On the upper floor is the completely finished attic. The house has 2 parking spaces of 50 m² with automated parking gate doors and electric car charger. Air conditioning through ducts in the house and with windows with tilt-and-turn opening. We want you to enjoy quality moments in your home, which are achieved through experience, the best collaborators, materials and the most advanced technology. Furthermore, every detail is studied to achieve greater energy efficiency and lower consumption. El Viso is a modern urbanization, located in a unique natural environment and full of life. In addition, it has all the necessary services for a Premium quality of life: bilingual school, large sports complex, supermarkets, local commerce, recreational and children's areas, 320,400m2 of green areas, complete aquatic complex and municipal SPA, intercity buses, etc. The urbanization is located 7 minutes from Alcalá de Henares and 25 minutes from Madrid, in a strategic communications enclave within the Henares Corridor: Alcalá Urbanizaciones.

LAST AND GROUND FLOORS FOR SALE Large apartments with terrace, ground floor apartments with garden and penthouses with large terrace with 2, 3 and 4 bedrooms in Alcalá Urbanización. They all have a garage and storage room. SUSTAINABILITY: The homes have been carefully studied and designed to obtain the highest energy efficiency rating that can be given to a home: ENERGY RATING A. The construction systems and materials used have allowed you to live in a totally efficient home with almost zero energy consumption. PRIVATE URBANIZATION: with 2,500 m² of common areas, salt chlorination swimming pools, children's games and extensive green areas. LARGE SPACES: spacious and bright homes, with the best use of each of the rooms. With a terrace or garden to extend the home outside and enjoy it with your loved ones. QUALITY: exquisite qualities that contribute to your well-being. A sustainable promotion with an aerothermal energy system in which much of the energy needed is extracted from the air. The refreshing underfloor heating, which emits heat in winter and cold in summer, is the culmination of a first-class promotion. LOCATION: in a UNIQUE NATURAL ENVIRONMENT full of life, with all the necessary services for your daily life. Located 10 minutes from the center of Alcalá and just 20 minutes from Madrid through quick connections with the A-2, R-2 and R-3.
